profile.name: Jonathan William Marino
profile.title: Tech Lead for Policy @ Google
profile.tagline: From E-Trade Babies to Enterprise Policy: Architecting the Integrity of the Future.

brand_narrative.bio_summary: A digital engineer and creative strategist who evolved from designing for Jay-Z and the E-Trade Babies to architecting Google's global policy infrastructure. I combine high-level creative direction with complex data engineering (SQL, Policy logic) to build systems that protect billions of users while eliminating friction. [cite: 8, 12, 42, 102]
brand_narrative.unique_value_prop: The Power of Synthesis: Combining Creative Motion, Web Design, Data Analysis, and Policy Engineering to solve problems others deem impossible. [cite: 97, 216]

northstars.name: The Integrity Imperative
northstars.description: Architecting data-driven solutions that ensure the fairness and consistency of Global Policy.

northstars.name: Frictionless Future
northstars.description: Using complex data analysis to pinpoint dissatisfaction at the source and turn policy challenges into high-trust experiences.

northstars.name: Elevate the Human
northstars.description: Freeing up high-level teams from manual review by building the 'Professional Google Inside' they never had.

experience_highlights.key_achievement: Architecting global data solutions for Policy, Trust & Safety, and Crisis Response across a 12-year tenure.

projects.name: ATO Crisis Response (Account Takeover Code Red)
details: Orchestrated the 'Code Red' operational cleanup for high-risk Account Takeovers (ATO), directly managing 'Option B' protocols for critical clients.
Engineered data pipelines integrating Buganizer CIDs into real-time dashboards, closing visibility gaps on missing cases.
Led the transition from manual Trix-based investigations to the automated AART Clean Up Tool, significantly reducing case resolution time.

projects.name: Certs CX Infrastructure (Ads Certifications)
details: Collaborated on the architectural expansion of 'MCC Inheritance' criteria, simplifying certification logic for parent accounts.
Developed scalable infrastructure for Certification Auditing and Revocation, ensuring policy compliance without throttling legitimate ad spend.
Implemented 'Structured & Transparent Rejection' logic, reducing support ticket volume by clarifying policy violations to users.

projects.name: AI & Internal Tooling Innovation
details: Built 'SlideSense' (NLP/Computer Vision), an AI tool that automates executive presentation review, saving 1,000+ management hours. [cite: 143]
Created 'Stevie,' a Gemini-powered audio synthesis interface, solving accessibility gaps for visually impaired users by enabling audio-only LLM chat. [cite: 149]
Engineered 'CARTA,' a custom GA4 analytics widget to solve complex document tracking issues that standard tools could not handle. [cite: 155]

projects.name: Global Operations Engineering
details: Founded and scaled 'Production Creative Works' from a pilot to a multi-million dollar global operation across APAC, EMEA, and AMER. [cite: 129]
Authored the core SOPs and Business Requirement Documents (BRDs) that standardized Google's creative supply chain. [cite: 134]
Implemented 'Data & Metrics Visualization' to track Time to Delivery and Revision Rates, moving creative management to objective P&L management. [cite: 136]

projects.name: Creative Technology (Ad Formats)
details: Led Technical Program Management for '3D Swirl,' enabling interactive 3D assets (glTF/glb) in display ads. [cite: 110]
Drove adoption of YouTube AR 'Virtual Try-On,' using ARCore to allow users to try makeup via front-facing camera. [cite: 118]
Served as Technical Consultant for 'Beyond the Map' (Rio Favelas) and 'Hidden Worlds' (National Parks), using 360-degree video/WebGL for digital archiving. [cite: 161, 163]

experience_highlights.key_achievement: Evolved from a singular video editor to a Director, building an internal creative production powerhouse.
experience_highlights.metrics: Managed 'award-winning projects' and defined pipeline management for video & graphics. [cite: 86]

experience_highlights.key_achievement: Built 'Goofer' for iPad, demonstrating full-stack mobile capability (Audio, 3D, Logic) during the early App Store boom. [cite: 91]
experience_highlights.metrics: Handled Music Creation, 3D Modeling, and Game Logic. [cite: 94]

experience_highlights.key_achievement: Pioneered early viral marketing and personalized interactivity. [cite: 21]
experience_highlights.metrics: Key contributor to 'Monk-e-Mail' (50M users) and the 'E-Trade Baby' Super Bowl campaign (ran for 6 years). [cite: 37, 46]

voice_settings.tone: Visionary but grounded, Authoritative, 'The Adult in the Room'
